privacyPolicy: Committed to ensuring the privacy and security of its users' information while providing a seamless experience.
infoCollectionAndUser: Collects various types of information to optimize its services.This may include personal information such as name, email, and contact details provided during registration, as well as operational data like ATM status, error logs, and location information for service enhancement purposes. We utilize this information to facilitate communication, provide support, improve functionality, and analyze performance to deliver the best possible experience to our users.
dataSecurity: We understand the importance of safeguarding your data and employ robust security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. While we implement industry-standard practices, it's important to note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is entirely secure. However, we are committed to continuously enhancing our security measures to mitigate risks.
sharingOFInformation: Ops360 does not sell, trade, or rent personal information to third parties. However, we may share aggregated and anonymized data for analytical purposes or to enhance our services. Rest assured, your personal information is treated with the utmost confidentiality and is only used in accordance with this Privacy Policy & Terms of Service.
